title: Derhasat jwngni Phorbua
lyrics:
Derhasat jwngni Phorbua
Homtha haya raobw Phowbukhou
Derhasat jwngni Phorbua
Santham unao sikhangfinbai --2
Ha ha . . . Halleluiya, Ho ho Hossanna -2
(A)
Okhanaisi phungni somao
Kharbwdwngmwn Mariama -2
Mariamkhou Arphoa bungbai
Nwngswrni Jisua thangkhangfinbai -2
(B)
Rongza nwngswr bima-bifafwr
Mwsa nwngswr subung harifwr -2
Gwthwini raja nwng laginangbai
Nwngni raijwabw jwbsrankhabai -2
